key_risks: Regulatory pressures around emissions, safety, and hours-of-service rules
Fuel price volatility affecting operating margins
Intense industry competition pressuring profit margins
controversies: Class-action lawsuits alleging violations of the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) and state wage laws
Workplace safety violations cited by OSHA with penalties totaling $7,410 in 2013
environmental_issues: Ongoing scrutiny over environmental impact despite efforts to improve fuel efficiency and reduce emissions
social_issues: Labor shortages and wage-related legal risks
governance_issues: Compliance with increasing regulations requiring ongoing investments

sources.title: ESG ratings information for Heartland Express, Inc.
sources.snippet: Heartland Express is a national truckload carrier, offering long haul and regional services. The company was founded in 1978 and reported revenue of $592 million in 2008.
